Name: Attack it! Devil legion
About the game: ◆Game play◆ This is a strategic action game. You can deploy various teams to defeat your enemies, there are 8 characters in the game, each character has 2 modes. Picking appropriate teammates to beat each level is the key of success. ◆Game content◆ This game uses pixel art to illustrate Hentai content. A total of more than 70 H animations, and a variety of color differential! Contain with Gellary and practice mode, include all H animations used in the game! There are 28 levels in total and the estimated completion time is 4-5 hours. Use the power of minions, make Demon great again!
